name: Apollo
description: Apollo is a spirited and athletic horse, perfect for experienced riders looking for a challenge. He loves long gallops in open fields.

name: Zeus
description: Zeus is a calm and dependable companion, ideal for beginners and nervous riders. He has a gentle nature and a very smooth gait.

name: Athena
description: Athena is intelligent and graceful, with a beautiful, flowing mane and tail. She excels at dressage and is a joy to ride for those who appreciate a responsive horse.

name: Poseidon
description: Poseidon is a true gentle giant. His calm demeanor and immense strength make him a favorite for therapy sessions and riders who enjoy a slower, steady pace.

name: Hera
description: Hera is a versatile and friendly mare, suitable for a wide range of riders. She is patient with beginners but has enough spirit to keep intermediate riders engaged.

name: Ares
description: With his distinctive spotted coat, Ares is a real eye-catcher. He has a playful personality and is best suited for riders who enjoy a bit of character.

name: Artemis
description: Artemis is a beautiful and good-natured horse. Her calm temperament makes her an excellent choice for therapy sessions and for children learning to ride.

name: Hermes
description: Small but mighty, Hermes is full of personality. He's a great pony for young children to build their confidence on.

name: Dionysus
description: Dionysus is an elegant and powerful horse with a striking presence. He is best for advanced riders who can handle his impressive and forward-moving gaits.

name: Persephone
description: Persephone is a beautiful mare with a kind and willing nature. She is well-suited for intermediate riders looking to improve their skills.

name: Hades
description: Hades has a strong and independent spirit. He forms a strong bond with his rider and is best for those with experience handling spirited horses.

name: Demeter
description: Demeter is known for her calm and gentle nature, as well as her beautiful, flowing feathers. She is perfect for therapy work and for riders of all levels.

name: Hephaestus
description: Hephaestus is a strong and steady draft horse. His reliable and easygoing nature makes him a great choice for beginner riders and for therapeutic riding.

name: Hestia
description: Hestia is a beautiful golden pony with a heart of gold. She is gentle, patient, and perfect for young riders and therapy sessions.

name: Nike
description: Nike is known for her incredible athleticism and stunning metallic coat. She is a forward and sensitive ride, best suited for advanced riders.

name: Morpheus
description: Morpheus is a dependable and intelligent horse, known for his smooth gaits and friendly disposition. He is an excellent all-rounder, great for both trail riding and arena work.
